definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: 1Sa 30:13, 2Sa 1:13, also (as pred.) v:2Sa 1:8; coll. = (the) Amalekites 1Sa 15:6, 1Sa 15:15, 1Sa 30:1, elsewh. c. art. ´[[הָע]] Nu 14:25, Nu 14:43, Nu 14:45 (J; all + [[הַכְּנַעֲנִי]]), 1Sa 27:8; ´[[שְׂדֵה הָע]] Ge 14:7; ´[[הַר הָע]] Ju Jdg 12:15 (in Ephraim); rd. ´[[הָע]] also Ju Jdg 1:16 (for [[הָעָם]]) Bu GFM, > [[עֲמָלֵק]] Hollenb Mey Kit:Kau; on 2Sa 1:1 v. foreg.
